channel.title: Web client help
channel.description:
Okay i made a webclient. I jar'd signed and everything. I uploaded to my website and it comes out as a download link instead of a webclient http://testmctestersin.totalh.com/pie/
anyone help ??

item.description:
@pan1c1 wrote:

What do you mean? can you explain it in further detail?

EDIT
ohhh nevermind
i get what you mean!!

Now i get this

item.title: Web client help
item.dc:creator: @r0ckstar96 r0ckstar96
item.description:
@r0ckstar96 wrote:

upload the client.jar file or what ever u named it to ur site, then make a new page called webclient.html or whatever and put this in the html editor

WEBCLIENT NAME [br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 06, 2009, 08:46:07 pm[/size][hr]replace JAR URL with the link of ur jar file u uploaded, mine would be flamedfury.bravehost.com/client.jar so something like that I'M NOT PURPOSELY ADVERTISING! I'M JUST GIVING AN EXAMPLE!

Read full topic
